markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghost Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=3500) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 47</row>

**Archetype** [Ghost](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=177)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Ghost Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3496)

</column>

---

You can suppress your tether to the ground, overcoming your resistance to fly free. For 10 minutes, your fly Speed doesn't restrict you to only a few inches off the ground, allowing you to travel to any height you choose.

<title level="2">Ghost Flight leads to...</title>
[Unlimited Ghost Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=3503)
name: Ghost Flight
